clientSide

Class TableStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.TableStub

  • public class TableStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Definition of the Stub to the Table shared region on this solution of the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableStub(java.lang.String serverHostName, java.lang.String serverPortNumb)
      Instantiation of the Table Stub.
